testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCAdapter::setPowered(true) sets a value of attribute NFCAdapter::powered to true

description.pre_condition: Turn OFF NFC adapter.

step.step_desc: Click "Run"
step.expected: NFC adapter should be enabled (ON) - pass

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCTag::readNDEF() reports error by calling errorCallback when NFC tag was disconnected

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare NFC tag.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move NFC tag close until it will be detected and then take it away before the expiration of 3 seconds.
step.expected: pass - readNDEF reported failure by error callback

testcase.purpose: Check if NFCTagDetectCallback::ondetach() callback is called when NFC tag is disconnected

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare NFC tag.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move NFC tag close until it will be detected and then take it away.
step.expected: pass - after setTagListener ondetach callback is called

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCTag::transceive() reports error by calling errorCallback when NFC tag is disconnected

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare NFC tag.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move NFC tag close until it will be detected and then take it away before the expiration of 3 seconds.
step.expected: pass - transceive reported failure by error callback

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCTag::writeNDEF() reports error by calling errorCallback when NFC tag is disconnected

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare NFC tag.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move NFC tag close until it will be detected and then take it away before the expiration of 3 seconds.
step.expected: pass - writeNDEF reported failure by error callback

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCAdapter::unsetTagListener() disables listener for detecting an NFC tag

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare NFC tag.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move NFC tag close so it will be detected and then click "Tag was attached" button.

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCAdapter::unsetPeerListener() disables listener for detecting an NFC peer-to-peer target

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move other NFC device close so it will be detected and then click "Peer was attached" button.

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCPeer::sendNDEF(ndefMessage, onSuccess, onError) can be called successfully

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on. Other device should be able to take NDEF message from NFC.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move other NFC device close so it will be detected. If other device receives message then PASS.

testcase.purpose: Check if NFCPeer::sendNDEF(ndefMessage, onSuccess) can be called successfully

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on. Other device should be able to take NDEF message from NFC.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move other NFC device close so it will be detected. If other device receives message then PASS.

testcase.purpose: Check if method NFCPeer::sendNDEF() reports error by calling errorCallback when peer is disconnected

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on. Other device should be able to take NDEF message from NFC.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Put the other NFC device close to your device until it will be detected and then take it away before the expiration of 3 seconds.

testcase.purpose: Check if NFCPeerDetectCallback::ondetach() is called when NFC peer is taken away

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Put the other NFC device close to your device until it will be detected and then take it away.
step.expected: pass - peerListener ondetach callback should be invoked

testcase.purpose: Check if method NDEFMessage::toByte() exists
Check if method NFCAdapter::getDefaultAdapter() exists
Check if method NFCPeer::sendNDEF() sends data to other NFC device

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on. Other device should be able to take NDEF message from NFC.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move other NFC device close so it will be detected.

testcase.purpose: Check if interface ByteArraySuccessCallback exists, it should not.
Check if interface NDEFMessageReadCallback exists, it should not.
Check if NDEFMessage constructor works without arguments
Check if NDEFMessage constructor works with rawData
Check NDEFMessage constructor with NDEF records array

Check if instance of interface NDEFMessage can be extended with new property

Check if attribute records of NDEFMessage exists, has type Array, can be overwritten

Check if attribute type of NDEFRecordMedia exists, has type Array and is readonly

Check if attribute languageCode of NDEFRecordText exists, has type DOMString and is readonly
Check if attribute payload of NDEFRecordText exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute text of NDEFRecordText exists, has type DOMString and is readonly
Check if attribute tnf of NDEFRecordText exists, has type short and is readonly
Check if attribute type of NDEFRecordText exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if NDEFRecordURI constructor works
Check if NDEFRecordURI exists
Check if instance of interface NDEFRecordURI can be extended with new property
Check if attribute id of NDEFRecordURI exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute payload of NDEFRecordURI exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute tnf of NDEFRecordURI exists, has type short and is readonly
Check if attribute type of NDEFRecordURI exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute uri of NDEFRecordURI exists, has type DOMString and is readonly
Check if NDEFRecord constructor works
Check if new tizen.NDEFRecord(raw_data) works
Check NDEFRecord constructor with all parameters
Check NDEFRecord constructor with only mandatory parameters
Check if NDEFRecord exists
Check if instance of interface NDEFRecord can be extended with new property
Check if attribute id of NDEFRecord exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute payload of NDEFRecord exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if attribute tnf of NDEFRecord exists, has type short and is readonly
Check if attribute type of NDEFRecord exists, has type Array and is readonly
Check if instance of interface NFCAdapter can be extended with new property
Check if method getCachedMessage of NFCAdapter works
Check if method getCachedMessage of NFCAdapter accepts extra argument
Check if interface NFCAdapter exists, it should not.
Check if attribute powered of NFCAdapter exists, has type Boolean and is readonly
Check if NFCAdapter::setPeerListener throws exception when given wrong detectCallback
Check verification of detectCallback by NFCAdapter::setPeerListener()
Check if adapter.setPeerListener() throws an exception when called without argument
Check NFCAdapter.setPowered() argument errorCallback conversions exception
Check NFCAdapter::setPowered() argument errorCallback validation - object with onerror property
Check NFCAdapter.setPowered() argument successCallback conversions exception
Check NFCAdapter::setPowered() argument successCallback validation - object with onerror property
Check NFCAdapter::setPowered() optional argument errorCallback - call without it
Check NFCAdapter::setPowered() optional argument without successCallback - call without it
Check if NFCAdapter::setTagListener throws exception when given wrong detectCallback
Check verification of detectCallback by NFCAdapter::setTagListener()
Check if adapter.setTagListener() throws an exception
Check if TypeMismatchError is thrown when NFCAdapter::setTagListener() is given wrong tagFilter
Check if method unsetPeerListener of NFCAdapter accepts extra argument
Check if method unsetTagListener of NFCAdapter accepts extra argument
Check if interface NFCManagerObject exists, it should not.
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_EMPTY and its value is 0
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_EXTERNAL_RTD and its value is 4
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_MIME_MEDIA and its value is 2
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_UNCHANGED and its value is 6
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_UNKNOWN and its value is 5
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_URI and its value is 3
Check if NFCManager has constant NFC_RECORD_TNF_WELL_KNOWN and its value is 1
Test whether the NFCManager object can have new properties added
Check if NFCManager::getDefaultAdapter() method returns object
Check if method getDefaultAdapter of NFCManager accepts extra argument
Check if interface NFCManager exists, it should not.
Check if interface NFCPeerDetectCallback exists, it should not.
Check if interface NFCPeer exists, it should not.
Check if NFCPeer::unsetReceiveNDEFListener() method works properly

description.pre_condition: Turn on NFC adapter. Prepare the other device with NFC turned on. Other device should be able to send NDEF message by NFC.

step.step_desc: Click "Run". Move other NFC device close so it will be detected, then send a NFC message from it. Then click the "Message was sent" button below.
